oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greening of the Finnish food system
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mononen, Tuija
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: By greening, it is meant the processes by which environmental concerns are nurtured within social groups and modern environmentally related symbols become increasingly prominent in social discourse. In the context of this research, greening appears as a growing demand for the products with an environmental image, for example, organic products.
